flavorText: "No need for a hurda? How about these maps to recently discovered tombs? Or these vials of invisible potion? Very fancy . . ."

foreignData.flavorText: „Brauchst du nicht einen Hurda? Wie wäre es mit einer Karte zu den neulich entdeckten Grabstätten? Oder mit diesen Fläschchen mit Unsichtbarkeitstrank? Die sind äußerst begehrt..."
foreignData.name: Basarhändler
foreignData.text: {T}: Ein Spieler deiner Wahl übernimmt die Kontrolle über ein Artefakt, eine Kreatur oder ein Land, das bzw. die du kontrollierst.

foreignData.flavorText: "¿No necesitas un hurda? ¿Qué tal estos mapas hacia tumbas recién descubiertas? ¿O estos viales de poción invisible? Muy bonitos..."
foreignData.name: Comerciante del bazar
foreignData.text: {T}: El jugador objetivo gana el control del artefacto, criatura o tierra objetivo que controlas.

foreignData.flavorText: « Pas besoin d'un hurda ? Ou de ces cartes indiquant des tombes fraîchement découvertes ? Ou d'une fiole de potion d'invisibilité ? C'est très mode... »
foreignData.name: Marchand du bazar
foreignData.text: {T} : Le joueur ciblé acquiert le contrôle de l'artefact, de la créature ou du terrain ciblé que vous contrôlez.

foreignData.flavorText: "Non hai bisogno di un hurda? Che ne dici di queste mappe di rovine appena scoperte? Magari delle fiale di pozione d'invisibilità? Vanno molto di moda..."
foreignData.name: Mercante del Bazaar
foreignData.text: {T}: Un giocatore bersaglio prende il controllo di un artefatto, una creatura o una terra bersaglio che controlli.

foreignData.flavorText: 「ハルダはいらないか？ 最近見つかった墓の地図は？ この透明薬の瓶なんかは？ すんげぇ珍しい……」
foreignData.name: バザールの交易商人
foreignData.text: {T}：プレイヤー１人と、あなたがコントロールするアーティファクト１つかクリーチャー１体か土地１つを対象とする。その前者はその後者のコントロールを得る。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — ゴブリン

foreignData.flavorText: "Não precisa de um hurda? Que tal esses mapas para sepulturas recém-descobertas? Ou esses frascos de poção de invisibilidade? É a última moda..."
foreignData.name: Negociante do Mercado
foreignData.text: {T}: O jogador alvo ganha o controle do artefato, da criatura ou do terreno alvo que você controla.

foreignData.flavorText: «А гурда вам не нужен? Может, вот эти карты к только что найденным гробницам? Или скляночки с невидимым зельем? Моднейшая штука!..»
foreignData.name: Базарный Торговец
foreignData.text: {T}: целевой игрок получает контроль над целевым артефактом, существом или землей под вашим контролем.

foreignData.flavorText: 「不需要荷得? 那这些地图呢？可以带你到最近发现的坟墓。 还是要几瓶隐身药？ 非常有用呢...」
foreignData.name: 市集贩商
foreignData.text: {T}：目标牌手获得目标由你操控的神器，生物，或地的操控权。

name: Bazaar Trader
originalText: {T}: Target player gains control of target artifact, creature, or land you control.

rulings.text: This effect has no duration. The targeted player retains control of the targeted permanent until the game ends, the permanent leaves the battlefield, or an effect causes someone else to gain control of it.
If either the targeted player or the targeted permanent is an illegal target by the time the ability resolves, the ability does nothing. The player won’t gain control of the permanent.

You may target yourself with Bazaar Trader’s ability. Normally, this won’t have any visible effect. However, the ability would override an effect with a limited duration that gave you control of a permanent. For example, if you temporarily gained control of a creature with Act of Treason, targeting yourself and that creature with Bazaar Trader’s ability would then cause you to gain control of the creature indefinitely.

text: {T}: Target player gains control of target artifact, creature, or land you control.
